title: AI boom sparks concern over data-centre power and water use in Switzerland

title: AI Chip Export Controversy: U.S. Faces Decision on Nvidia Sales to China
description: A debate rages over the potential sale of Nvidia's advanced AI chips to China, which could compromise U.S. technological advantages in artificial intelligence. Lawmakers and experts argue against the move, citing national security concerns and the potential for China to gain a significant leap in AI capabilities.
content: A leading Republican figure in Congress has compared the sale of Nvidia's top AI chips to China to providing Iran with weapons-grade uranium. Such a sale would diminish America's technological edge in artificial intelligence, warned John Moolenaar, C... [705 chars]

title: Gold Pushes Higher As Market Digests Outcome Of Xi-Trump Meeting
description: Gold advanced following a run of losses, as traders digested the outcome of a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping. Bullion rose as much as 2.1%, after falling almost 5% over the previous four sessions. Trump said it was an “amazing meeting” and that China would halt rare earth controls and resume purchases of American soybeans. Xi said his country is willing to cooperate with the US in areas such as trade, energy and artificial intelligence

title: Meta loses 12% market cap after $70B AI spending plan sparks investor doubts despite strong quarter
description: Meta Platforms’ stock took a sharp hit on Thursday, sliding more than 12% as investors grew uneasy about CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s massive new spending plans for artificial intelligence.
